product_overview: A comprehensive AI-powered educational platform combining advanced question generation, paper creation, teaching presentation, and collaborative whiteboard capabilities. It supports rich content formats, multilingual questions, intelligent templates, and seamless integration for an enriched teaching-learning experience.
core_goals: Enable rapid AI-driven question creation and editing with rich formatting.
Support advanced question paper generation with full content preservation including tables, images, and equations.
Provide immersive teaching and presentation interfaces with annotation and timer tools.
Deliver a high-quality AI-powered PPT generator to convert educational content to professional presentations.
Facilitate real-time collaboration and version control among educators.
Offer a robust search, filter, and tagging system to manage large question databases efficiently.
Ensure accessibility, security, and privacy compliance throughout the platform.
key_features: AI-powered multi-format question creation and editing with rich text, images, equations, and bilingual support.
Advanced question paper generator with intelligent template system preserving all content types including complex tables and mathematical formulas.
Full-screen PPT-style teaching mode with navigation, timer, and session summary tools.
Digital collaborative whiteboard with infinite canvas, multiple drawing tools, live cursors, comments, and sharing permissions.
AI-powered PPT Generator that transforms topics and documents into professionally designed presentations with multiple templates and smart layouts.
Comprehensive content management with tagging, versioning, bulk editing, and advanced filtering options.
Detailed analytics dashboard for question usage, quality assessment, and teaching insights.
Offline capabilities with synchronization, cloud backup, and conflict resolution.
Multi-view support: Creator Mode, Teacher Mode, Student Mode, and Admin Mode with role-specific features.
user_flow_summary: Users can create and edit questions using a powerful rich text editor supporting images, tables, and equations with auto-save and version control.

Educators generate complete question papers by either manual drag-drop, AI-assisted auto-generation, or using predefined templates, previewing and exporting in multiple formats including DOCX and PDF.
Teachers access question sets via secure codes, conduct presentations in full-screen mode with navigation shortcuts, annotations, timer, and session management.
Students practice questions in practice or test modes with instant feedback, hints, and progress tracking.
Real-time collaboration features allow multiple users to edit whiteboards simultaneously with live cursor tracking and commenting.
AI PPT Generator converts educational topics or uploaded documents into presentation outlines and slides with customization and export options.
Administrators manage users, permissions, and monitor usage and quality reports via dashboards.
validation_criteria: AI question generation must produce accurate, well-structured, and bilingual-capable questions with proper metadata.
Question paper exports preserve all formatting, including tables, images, and equations, across DOCX and PDF outputs.
Full-screen teaching presentation responds instantly to navigation commands and saves annotations correctly.
Real-time collaboration reflects changes across users with minimal latency and maintains conflict-free state.
PPT Generator completes slide generation within 60 seconds for a 10-slide presentation with professional quality.
Search and filtering must return relevant results within 500ms on large datasets (100,000+ questions).
Accessibility standards WCAG 2.1 AA compliance achieved across all interfaces.
Security features including authentication, authorization, and data encryption must be fully tested and operational.
Offline mode correctly syncs changes when online connectivity is restored without data loss or duplication.

features.name: Bilingual Refinement Studio
features.description: Refinement Studio now correctly manages bilingual content (English/Hindi) by forcing editor remounts when switching languages. This prevents content persistence issues where English text would remain when switching to Hindi mode. The Studio includes a 3-column layout for Question, Answers/Logic, and Metadata.

features.name: Advanced Rich Text Editor
features.description: Enhanced Rich Text Editor with professional features: Undo/Redo history stack, Math Symbol insertion, Font Size control, Text/Background Color pickers, Code View (HTML source editing) with formatting, and improved Toolbar layout.
